mcq.statement: What was Raja Dahir's response to Hajjaj bin Yousaf's request regarding the pirates?

options.b: He had no control over the pirates

mcq.one_liner: Raja Dahir bluntly replied to Hajjaj bin Yousaf that he had **no control over the pirates**.

suggestions.topic: Arrival of Muhammad bin Qasim to Subcontinent (712)
Arrival of Muhammad bin Qasim to Subcontinent (712)
